channel.title: Reviewer Comments
channel.description: Give the review team some feedback or ask a question on anything you think they'll answer.

item.title: CTFM help
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slabjacker)
item.dc:creator: Slabjacker
item.content:encoded:
I've downloaded a few multi CFT maps and the maps work but the four coloured flags don't show; only the standard blue and red. I've downloaded the MCFT texture file, the Multi CFT Beta2, and MCTF mutators; I've enabled it in the mutators menu and selected it in game type.

All maps work but no green and yellow flags. Any suggestions?

SJ

item.title: Reviews after the BU crash
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ultimate_Weasel)
item.dc:creator: Ultimate_Weasel
item.content:encoded:
Okay, since the BU meteor crash didn't wreck my NC profile, I found myself wondering...

Might it be worth a try to clean the review request list up a bit? I mean, NaliCity shows too few signs of life ATM, except for the comments.

item.title: Maps that should not be reviewed
item.author: invalid@example.com (ArcadiaVincennes)
item.dc:creator: ArcadiaVincennes
item.content:encoded:
I was shocked this week when I checked my review request list and found a review request for DM-Deck16-ultamegareeeedemerme.

Reviewing a map such as that is a waste of my time, and the time of the people who read the review. Whoever requested the review may be chuckling softly to themselves but I am not amused. The author intended the map as a joke so I treated the review as a joke. I hope, despite the comments posted to him on his map page, that he endeavors to continue mapping and I...

Maps that should not be reviewed

item.title: Review Queue
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ticalion)
item.dc:creator: Ticalion
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,

I was wondering if you have a review queue that mappers can check the progress of their maps on?

I'm interested in finding out roughly when or if my map will be getting a review?

Thanks


Tical

item.title: Review request
item.author: invalid@example.com (wattoo)
item.dc:creator: wattoo
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I'm new to this sort of thing, but I requested a review a while back (April) and it still hasn't happened. Now I'm sure there's a massive workload, but there's other maps that have had reviews far more recently.

Unless my map is reviewed by my peers, it's kind of hard for me to get better and produce maps that more people will want to play.

Is there some weird system other than first come, first served or has my map fallen by the wayside for another reason.

Cheers

P.S....

Review request

item.title: Review request
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kantham)
item.dc:creator: Kantham
item.content:encoded:
It seems like i have been droping lately.

I made a request of it 3 months ago (i guess, it's still on)

First, ONS-Tek got reviwed and then on a hotlist for quile a while, then i released Coldsteel which many people liked. But now i am being currious. ONS-Windfield wasen't satifiying enough. For some reason i'd like to see coldsteel reviwed. I am very friendly with small and clean review. Just a 20 Minute play test and review of about 2000 letters should be ok. If i am not wrong this post...

Review request

item.title: Problemes with Unreal Tournament online
item.author: invalid@example.com (Das_Omen)
item.dc:creator: Das_Omen
item.content:encoded:
There's nothin like a list if i klick on assult or ctf or else.
And if I press F5, it reloads, but no game is comming.
Maybe I need the newest patch. Where can i get it?

And please write easy english, i'm german.

Thanks for answers,
Omen

item.title: To whoever deleted my map ratings
item.author: invalid@example.com (Chopin)
item.dc:creator: Chopin
item.content:encoded: To whoever deleted user ratings from my map and disallowed further ratings, go kill yourself.

item.title: ONS-Ahebban Review Discussion
item.author: invalid@example.com (ArcadiaVincennes)
item.dc:creator: ArcadiaVincennes
item.content:encoded:
I received a post over at the UCMP forums railing against my review of ONS-Ahebban. I will not reproduce the entire post as some of it was directed (unecessarily) against the UCMP team in general. I will reproduce the contents of the post that relate to the review and the map and will address them here.

Before I start, I want to say a few things...

I was honored to have been chosen to be a reviewer here and I hope that the reviews I have made thus far are fair, honest looks at maps....

ONS-Ahebban Review Discussion

item.title: Recent comments in maps I recently reviewed
item.author: invalid@example.com (ArcadiaVincennes)
item.dc:creator: ArcadiaVincennes
item.content:encoded:
I still find myself compelled to respond to maps that end up in my personal queue. I know I would want the same attention paid to them if I was an author requesting a review.

DM-Cake - Requested by someone who was not the author so I hope you could tell I didn't spend much time on the review.

DM-SOP-Bedrooms - This was requested by the actual author so I obliged him with an honest review.

The other two maps scored above a 3 which in my opinion is not a crap map but merely a bad...

Recent comments in maps I recently reviewed

item.title: Maps Without a Story...
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTD-Carthage)
item.dc:creator: GTD-Carthage
item.content:encoded:
We all see several good maps these days. Ones that are complex in which the authors spend months to fix. Map authors sometimes include custom scripts, textures, and effects even. They put everything they can take from their imagination and throw it into their maps. But, on thing disturbs me...

These mappers, though are skilled in basically everything about mapping, though they spend their time developing even more maps just as good or even better, THEY don't even bother to write a story...

Maps Without a Story...

item.title: Music problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slabjacker)
item.dc:creator: Slabjacker
item.content:encoded:
Not sure if this is where to post this comment but here it goes.

Recently downloaded "7Bullets" and installed. Got the Old Skool mod to work but not 7Bullets itself. Since I've done this, all the music tracks for every map in my UT collection aren't playing; instead I have the Menu music playing for every map. I've tried to find a way to restore it but I can't figure it out; and there are some good tracks on some of those maps! Can anybody help?

SJ

item.title: Let Me Introduce Myself...
item.author: invalid@example.com (ArcadiaVincennes)
item.dc:creator: ArcadiaVincennes
item.content:encoded:
I'm ArcadiaVincennes - the new reviewer - and I wanted to introduce myself:

I've been gaming for about 20 years - mostly on PC. I'm a big FPS fan and have dabbled in other genres. My hard drive is loaded with games and now, it's swelling larger with maps.

As for mapping, I created some maps for Doom and Duke Nukum 3D back in the day. Recently I started mapping again with UT2004. I'm still learning the finer points of the editor but I hope my experience with it so far, and in the...

Let Me Introduce Myself...

item.title: A little hello :)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Icedancer)
item.dc:creator: Icedancer
item.content:encoded:
Well just thought i would post a Hello here

I'm Icedancer, a new reviewer at NaliCity3

I hope you will all enjoy reading my reviews as much as i enjoy writing them and playing your maps

Its great to be a part of this amazing community



Ice

item.title: ONS-DarkFolly
item.author: invalid@example.com (Enfyrneaux)
item.dc:creator: Enfyrneaux
item.content:encoded:
I again want to thank AMmayhem for the review of my first released ONS map. My map isn't utter crap, but it needs work

For the past month or so I have been renovating ONS-DarkFolly into a much nicer (and hopefully faster) map. I want this new version to be as polished and fun as possible, and I want to know what you guys would want to see in it.

item.title: Game server rental
item.author: invalid@example.com (Frodo37)
item.dc:creator: Frodo37
item.content:encoded:
I want to rent a ut2004 gameserver......... I have been researching them on the web, but there are so many to choose from.... can anyone give me some feedback from experience on which would be the best performance (ping) from northern michigan.
I have a read alot positive, and some not so positive on a company by the name of VSK game servers..........
Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated, Thanks.......

item.title: DM-1on1-Movar
item.author: invalid@example.com (milb)
item.dc:creator: milb
item.content:encoded:
It would be nice if anyone could review my latest map. I've uploaded some it time ago and it's not reviewed till jet! Actually Nahand should write the review, but looks like he won't do it!
Here is the Link DM-1on1-Movars
Hm, I know this map isn't very good, but I want to know waht I could make better next time!

item.title: Tutorials/Forums/Messages... bah... i don't find what i want!
item.author: invalid@example.com (anatoly_k)
item.dc:creator: anatoly_k
item.content:encoded:
One thing that your forums (and other forums, tutorials, etc.) don't say is "Wich program should I use to edit/make a Unreal Tournament Map?" or something like that...
Mail me to anatoly_kasparov@msn.com , please and tell me. Cause I get a little lost in forums =). Okay

item.title: DM-1on1-TheCore
item.author: invalid@example.com (barballs)
item.dc:creator: barballs
item.content:encoded:
First off I would like to thank Ironblayde for taking the time to write such a detailed review of my map. With this review I will be able to make my next map even better for you all.

The "pretty wierd" one-trigger-two-pools was a result of bad copy/paste syndrome. The lack of sounds overall was my lack of confidence with my ability to put them in correctly. I will try adding them in more for the my next work.

This was the same result wih the anti-portals. I understand how they work, I...

DM-1on1-TheCore

item.title: AS-ColdSteel, LOL
item.author: invalid@example.com (Aggressor)
item.dc:creator: Aggressor
item.content:encoded:
First off, it's pointless and kinda off to review such an old map in the first place because merits and standards have changed so much in these years. This map has already gained it's worthy place among community maps and having a review to dig it out is just lame. More so because there was a second version, AS-ColderSteel released as well.

Secondly, this map sure has shortcomings, much like *every solid AS map has*. The map has chokepoints? Every AS map has them, more or less. It has...

AS-ColdSteel, LOL
